column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I am not as much of a fan as other folks but I can see how people like them. We tried their passion fruit sangria
column2: but it was quite watered down. The best part of the meal were the albondigas
column3: which were quite most and flavorful. The iberico ham croquetas were far too salty and Paella Mixta sorely missed salt. The beef empenada and hangar steak were both fine
column4: but the meats themselves lacked a little flavor. I wanted to enjoy this
column5: but its just not my favorite tapas spot. Its nice enough for brunch with friends however I probably wouldnt go for a meaningful dinner.
